trends: there have been no other sightings in between springfield\fair
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was driving to work, leaving springfield heading to kettering. i was driving on highway 70 going westbound, entering highway 675..as i was approaching the merge i happened to look up in the sky (it wasn't unusual to see aircraft flying above due to wright patterson air force base being so close)what i saw off in a near distance was some kind of air craft..i couldn't see the shape,because it was dark outside, however there were lights under the aircraft. the main thing that caught my eye was the sparks or sparkles coming out of the bottom of the craft. the best way i can describe it, is the sparklers that kids have on the 4th of july.. it looked very similar to those, but several coming down and disappearing before they hit the ground. i was on my cell phone talking to my mother at the time...she told me to hang up and take a picture with my phone. when i tried, the craft was gone. i thought it may have been something the air force was doing, so i thought nothing of it. then the next day, was 9\11\2001. i've told my parents, husband, kids and some friends about what i seen, but didn't think much of it..until i was just watching your show ufo's over earth bucks county flap...when the woman was talking about the glitter falling and the image was animated, i started shaking. i never thought anyone else would have seen the same thing i seen. i have only seen two ufo's in my life,one when i was 8yrs old and it scared me half to death, and i do believe now, this was a ufo as well. that's my experience, thanks for reading.
Summary: Object in the sky with sparkles falling from the bottom
